page.title: 08LIFE IN SKREENS PARK,ROXWELL
page.content:
In Skreens Park Wood live an elderly couple. They don't live in a proper house they live in a stable from Skreens Mansion. They have no electricity.They have lots of animals donkeys, chickens, cockerel, wild cats and a dog. They own 7-8 acres of land and in that land they have a red brick wall which is worth Â£1500. 10 houses could be built out of the wall. They have had lots of builders ask if they would sell the wall but they said no. They also have on their land collectors items of tractors and cars.
Neither of them work as they're both retired. The man said the wall was built 200 years ago and will be there for another 200 years , hopefully.
